(alias) function toBlobs<const data extends Hex | ByteArray, to extends To = (data extends `0x${string}` ? "hex" : never) | (data extends ByteArray ? "bytes" : never)>(parameters: ToBlobsParameters<data, to>): ToBlobsReturnType<to>
import toBlobs
tags:
```ts
import { toBlobs, stringToHex } from 'viem'

const blobs = toBlobs({ data: stringToHex('hello world') })
```
